name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Features complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload, audio player for existing themes, loading animations, delete functionality, and media library overview.
changelog: v1.0.4: Fixed critical build issue - plugin DLL was being deleted during build. Plugin now loads correctly in Jellyfin.
